titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached at St. Pauls Church in London, April 17. 1659. And now published at the desire of the Lord Mayor, and the court of aldermen. / By Nath. Ingelo D.D. and Fellow of Eton Coll.
titleStmt.author: Ingelo, Nathaniel, 1621?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for L. Fawn, at the sign of the Parrot in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
